review: Heaton and Associates did an effective job handling my case. From the very beginning to the end, attorney Heaton was accessible, attentive, and made sure I received the care that I needed. They were strong advocates for me as attorneys should be. I would certainly recommend them to anyone in need of a personal injury law firm.
